author: pbs.org
title: 2016 Ford Shelby GT 350R/GT 350 & 2016 Lexus RX MotorWeek
text: In this episode, we test if the Shelby legacy is still going strong in the 2016 GT350s. Pat Goss shows us how to go the extra mile. Roger Mecca scores some seat time in a vintage Shelby GT350. And later, weâ€™ll find out if the new Lexus RX is just what the doctor ordered.
